The e-commerce and marketing company PAN: The e-commerce and marketing company PANDA47 was launched in early 2023 from Mersin - Turkey as its center. It is an electronic company registered and licensed under the Turkish Trade and Retail Law represented by its sole and exclusive website (https://panda47.net) in addition to its official applications on Google Play and Apple Store. The PANDA47 website allows people and individuals wishing to shop online to have safe and reliable access to a large number of products directly from legal Turkish stores. Our website also provides an opportunity to sell through it to small and large stores in a unified and simple system. Our website is characterized by a streamlined accounting system for calculating commissions on the basis of sales, which encourages the seller to sell his products more quickly without fear of large commissions on the products, which may lose a large part of his profits, as in other sites and applications. We are happy to serve you.
